dict.string: Language learning
Describe an English class that you enjoyed
when and where you had the lesson?&who gave the lesson?&what the lesson was about?&and explain why you enjoyed it.
Language learning
Talk about something you would like to do after you pass IELTS.

When you think you will do it?&Why you would like to do that thing?&How long you have had that plan?&And say whether you think having that plan will motivate you to do better in the test or not, and why?
Language learning
Talk about a language test you have taken.
Where you took the test?&How long it took?&What skills and language knowledge you were tested on?&And say if you think that was a good test of your language level or not, and why?
Language learning
Talk about an English language book you have read or used.
Why you bought or used that book?&What you learnt from using it?&If it was difficult or easy to use?&And say if you would use a similar book again or not, and why?
Language learning
Talk about one method of learning a foreign language you have used.
What you did?&How long you used this method for?&How it compares to other methods of learning a language?&And say if you will use that same method in the future or not, and why?
Language learning
Talk about another language you would like to learn.

Which countries or regions it is spoken in?&How it is different from your language and from English?&Why you are interested in that language?&And say if you think it is more or less difficult to learn than English and your language, and why?
Future plans
Describe a well-paid job you would like to do in the future
What the job is?&How you came to know about it?&What kind of people can do this job?&And explain why you like this job
Future plans
Describe a future plan which is not related to work or study.
what the plan is?&when you thought of the plan?&who is involved in the plan?&and say how you think you will achieve the plan?
Future plans
Describe something youâ€™ve always wanted to do but have not done yet
What it is about?&Why you plan to do it?&What is the easy part and difficult part of it?&Why you have not done yet?
Future plans
Talk about a sport you think is interesting but have never played.
What equipment is needed?&What some of the rules are?&What kinds of people this sport is popular with?&And say if you think you will do this sport in the near future or not, and why?
Future plans
Talk about a musical instrument you would like to be able to play but have never tried.
What the instrument looks like?&How you play it?&What kinds of music are played on it?&And say if you think you will learn to play that instrument or not, and why?
Future plans
Talk about your next trip abroad.

Where you are going or would like to go?&What you want to do there?&What souvenirs you would like to bring back?&And say whether you think your next trip overseas will be as you would like it to be or not, and why?
Future plans
Talk about another language you are interested in learning.
Where it is spoken?&How it is different from your language and from English?&Why you are interested in that language?&And say if it is popular to learn that language in your country or not, and why?
Future plans
Talk about something you would like to buy.
What it looks like?&What it is used for?&Why you want to buy it?&And say if you think you will buy it or not, and why?
Future plans
Talk about a new hobby you would like to take up.

What the advantages of the hobby are?&What the difficulties of doing that hobby would be?&How you first became interested in that hobby?&And say if you think you will do that hobby in the near future or not, and why?
Future plans
Talk about a subject you would like to study in the future.

What you need to study as part of that subject?&Where you can study it?&What you think the most difficult things about that subject would be?&And say if you think studying that subject will be useful in your future life or not, and why?
Future plans
Talk about a job you would like to do in the future.

What people have to do in that job?&Why you are interested in that job?&If there are any disadvantages or difficulties to doing that job?&And say if you think you will be good at that job or not, and why?
Future plans
Talk about your plans for your next long holiday.
Where you are thinking of going?&Who you would like to go there with?&What you would like to do there?&And say if you think you will do what you are planning or not, and why?
Future plans
Talk about a foreign country you have never been to and would like to visit

How that place is similar and different to your country and other countries you have visited?&Why you are interested in going there?&What you would like to do there?&And say if you think you will go to that country in the near future or not, and why?
Future plans
Talk about a goal or ambition you have.

When and why you first got that goal or ambition?&What you need to do to make it come true?&What your next step needs to be?&And say if you think you will achieve that goal or ambition or not, and why?
Future plans
Talk about one thing you are planning to do after you pass the IELTS test.
When you think you will do it?&Why you want to do it?&How long you have had that plan?&And say whether there are any other options that you could also do which are just as good?
Future plans
Talk about one thing you are going to do next weekend.
Where you are going to do it?&Who you are going to do it with?&Any equipment you need to do it?&And say whether you are looking forward to it or not, and why?
Holidays and travel
Describe a foreign country you have never been to.
where the country is?&when you will go there?&why you would like to go there?&and explain why this is a good country to visit.
Holidays and travel
Describe a historical place that you know about.
what the place is?&where it is located?&what is the historical significance of the place
Holidays and travel
Talk about a city you visited and which had impressed you.
where it is situated and why you visited it?&what you did there?&what were the attractive part of this city?&and explain why this city impressed you so much.
Holidays and travel
Describe your holidays.
where you go for the holidays?&how long they last?&who you go with?&and talk about any interesting thing happened during your holidays.
Holidays and travel
Talk about an unusual food you have eaten abroad.
Where was it and what was the food?&Did you like or dislike that food? Why?&Why did you decide to try it?
Holidays and travel
Describe a trip you had by bike.
When and where you had the trip?&Who you went with?&Why you had the trip by bike?&And explain how you felt about it.
Holidays and travel
Describe a time you had good experience in the countryside.
where you went?&what you did?&when you did it?&who you went with and explain why it was enjoyable.
Holidays and travel
Describe a city youâ€™ve visited that you like
Where is it?&When did you go there?&What did you do their?&And explain why you like it?
Holidays and travel
Describe the transport system in a place you know about.

What kind of transport is available?&Which kinds most people use?&What the good points and bad points of the transport system is?&And say how the transport system in that place compares to other places you know about?
Holidays and travel
Talk about your plans for your next long vacation.
Where you want to go?&Who you want to go there with?&What you want to do when you get there?&And say how likely you are to do what you have planned, and why?
Holidays and travel
Talk about your dream holiday.
Where you would like to go?&What kind of accommodation you would like to stay in?&What activities you would like to do?&And say if you ever think you will go on a holiday like that or not, and why?
Holidays and travel
Talk about a part of your country you have never been to but would like to visit
Why you have never been there before?&If or when you think you might go?&Why you would like to go?&And say how you first became interested in going to that place?
Holidays and travel
Talk about a foreign country you have never been to but would like to visit
Why you have never been there before?&If or when you think you might go?&Why you would like to go?&And say how you first became interested in going to that place?
Holidays and travel
Talk about a hotel, bread and breakfast, campsite etc. you have stayed in on holiday.
Why you chose that place?&How long you stayed there?&What the good and bad things about it were?&And say whether you would like to stay in the same place again, and why?
Holidays and travel
Talk about a day trip you have been on.
Where you went?&How you travelled?&Why you chose to go to that place?&And say whether you would like to go back to the same place again or not, and why?
Holidays and travel
Talk about one means of transport that you often use.

Where you usually go by that means of transport?&What the advantages of that method of travelling are?&What the disadvantages are?&And say if you think you will use that means of transport more or less often in the future, and why?
Holidays and travel
Talk about something tourists like to do in your town or country.
How well known it is?&Why it is popular?&What kinds of people like to do it?&And say if you think it will become more popular or less popular in the future and why?
Holidays and travel
Talk about a foreign country you have been to or would like to go to on holiday.
Where that country is?&Why it is a good place to go on holiday?&What things there are to do there?&And say whether you think you will go there or go there again in the near future or not, and why?
Holidays and travel
Describe a journey you have been on.
Where you went?&What kind or kinds of transport you used?&How long the journey took?&And say whether you think it was easy to take journey or not, and why?
Holidays and travel
Talk about somewhere you went on holiday.
How you got there?&What activities you did there?&Who you went with?&And say if you would recommend that holiday to a friend or not, and why?
Holidays and travel
Talk about an activity you like doing when you are on holiday.
Where you usually do it?&Who you do it with?&Why you enjoy it?&And say whether you also enjoyed doing that when you were a child or not, and why?
Holidays and travel
Talk about a thing you always take with you on holiday.
What it looks like?&Why you need it?&When you first started using it?&And say if you think you could have a good holiday without it or not, and why?
Festivals and celebrations
Describe an important event in your life.
what is it?&how old you were then?&what happened?
Festivals and celebrations
Talk about how you usually celebrate the New Year.
Where you usually go?&Who you spend your time with?&What you eat and drink?&And say if you think New Year is one of the most important festivals in your country and why?
Festivals and celebrations
Talk about the next festival or celebration in your family or your country.
If it is a big celebration?&What it being celebrated?&What people will do on that day?&And say if you think you will enjoy that day or not, and why?
Festivals and celebrations
Talk about the last time your whole family got together.
Why you got together?&What you did together?&If everyone enjoyed themselves?&And say if your family often get together and why?
Festivals and celebrations
Talk about your favourite day of the year
When it is?&Why you like it?&What you usually do?&And say how it compares to other special days of the year?
Festivals and celebrations
Talk about a birthday you can remember well.
How you celebrated?&Who you were with?&Why you remember that day?&And say how it was different from other birthdays you have had before or since?
Festivals and celebrations
Describe a party that you attended
Who invited you?&Where you were invited?&What the party was celebrating?&And say if took anything with you to the party or not, and why?
Festivals and celebrations
Describe a traditional festival or celebration in your country.
What is being celebrated?&What people do?&How long people have been celebrating this way?&And say if you think this festival or celebration will change in the future or not, and why?
Festivals and celebrations
Describe your favourite festival or celebration
What time of year it is?&Why you like it?&What you usually do?&And say how that festival or celebration compares to others in your country or abroad?
Festivals and celebrations
Describe a typical festival or celebration in your country
When it usually happens?&What it is celebrating?&What people do?&And say if that is your favourite celebration or not, and why?
Festivals and celebrations
Describe a present that you gave someone
Who you gave it to?&Why you decided to give them a present?&Why you chose that present?&And say how that present compares to other presents you have given that person or other people?
Festivals and celebrations
Describe a present that you someone gave you
Who you got it from?&Why they gave it to you?&If that present has been useful to you?&And say what kind of person you would give a similar present to?
About Your Hometown
Talk about a well-known businessman/woman in your country.
who is the person?&how you know this person?&how she/he became successful?&and explain why you consider him/her as a successful business person.
About Your Hometown
Describe an important plant in your country.
What the plant is?&How you know it?&Why it is important?&And explain how much you like the plant.
About Your Hometown
Describe a shop in your hometown or the placed you are living now.
Where it is?&What it sells?&What the advantages of shopping there are?&And say whether you often go shopping there or not, and why?
About Your Hometown
Describe a park in your hometown or near where you are living.
Where it is?&What it looks like?&What people usually do there?&And say if you often go to the park or not, and why?
About Your Hometown
Describe the place you were born in or grew up in.
What kind of place it is?&Where it is?&What things there are to do there?&And say if that is the place you would most like to be living in now or not, and why?
About Your Hometown
Describe a shopping street in your hometown

What things you can buy there?&What the most popular shops are?&Any changes there have been over the years?&And say if you think shopping there will become more or less popular in the future, and why?
About Your Hometown
Describe the transport system in your hometown or the place you are living now.

What kind of transport there is?&Which kind of transport most people use?&What the good points and bad points of the transport system is?&And say if you think most people are happy with the transport system or not, and why?
About Your Hometown
Describe some countryside near your hometown or the place where you are living now.
What it looks like?&What people usually do there?&How you can get there from your home?&And say whether you often go to the place or not, and why?
About Your Hometown
Describe something famous in your hometown or local area.
What it is?&Why it is famous?&How well known it is?&And say if that thing makes you feel proud of your hometown or local area or not, and why?
About Your Hometown
Describe a landmark in your hometown or the place you are living now
What it looks like?&Why it is a landmark?&What it is used for?&And say if it is popular with the local people and tourists or not, and why?
About Your Hometown
Describe a famous food from your hometown or country.
What it looks like?&What it tastes like?&When and how it is usually eaten?&And say why you think it is famous?
About Your Hometown
Describe a city, town or village you know well
Where it is?&What it looks like?&What kind of people live there?&And say if you think it is a good place to live or not, and why?
Home and accommodation
Describe a shop near where you live that you sometimes use.
what sorts of product or service it sells?&what the shop looks like?&where it is located?&and explain why you use this shop.
Home and accommodation
Talk about an equipment of your household.
what is it?&what you do with it?&will you always keep it?&and explain why it is important for you.
Home and accommodation
Describe an ideal house that you would like to live in
where it would be?&what type of house it would be?&how you would decorate it?&who you would like to live with&explain why you would like to live in this kind of home.
Home and accommodation
Describe a quiet place
Where it is?&What you can do there?&Who you would like to go with?&and explain how you feel about this place
Home and accommodation
Describe a time you moved to a new home or school
When did you move?&Where did you move to?&Why did you move?&And explain how did you feel about that?
Home and accommodation
Talk about the place where one of your friends or relations lives.
Where it is?&What it is like?&What the local area is like?&And say if you would like to live in that place or not, and why?
Home and accommodation
Describe a house or flat that you know well but have never lived in.
Whose home it is or was?&What it looks like?&What the local area is like?&And say if you would like to live in that place or not, and why?
Home and accommodation
Describe the first place you remember living
How old you were when you first started living there?&What you remember best about the place?&If you moved away or not, and why?&And say if you remember that place well or not, and why?
Home and accommodation
Describe your dream home
What it would look like outside?&What it would look like inside?&What kind of area it would be in?&And say if you think you will really live in a house like that or not, and why?
Home and accommodation
Describe your neighbourhood
What kind of shops there are?&What green spaces and natural features there are?&What things there are to do?&And say what kind of person you think would like living in that kind of area, and why?
Home and accommodation
Describe a place you have lived in or are living now
Where it is?&What are the good things about it?&What are the bad things about it?&And say where you would like to live if you didnâ€™t live there?
Home and accommodation
Describe your favourite room in the place you are living now
What it looks like?&What you usually use it for?&Why you like it?&And how it compares to other rooms you have been in or know about?
what class the teacher taught you and how old you were?&what subject did he teach?&what the teacherâ€™s special qualities and characteristics were?&and explain why you remember this teacher.
Describe a teacher from your past that you remember.
Work and Studies
what the website was?&how you found the address for this website?&what the website contained?&and explain why it was useful to you.
Describe a useful website you have visited.
Work and Studies
what the method is?&when you started to use it?&how you knew it?&and explain why it is helpful?
Describe a method to save money.
Work and Studies
What it is?&How you knew about it?&What this company does?&How you feel about it?
Describe a big company or organization you know.
Work and Studies
Who the person is?&What kind of person?&How this person help you?&Why do you think this person is helpful
Describe a person who is helpful in your study or work.
Work and Studies
what the change was?&when it happened?&where it happened?&and explain how you have benefited from this change?
Describe a positive change that you have made to your life.
Work and Studies
where you would like to go?&what kind of work you would like to have?&when you would like to go?&and explain why you want to work in that place.
Describe a foreign country that you want to work in.
Work and Studies
What the invention was?&What it can do?&How popular it is?&Why it is an important invention?
Describe an invention that changed the world.
Work and Studies
Where you usually meet or met?&When you first met?&What things you talk or talked about?&And say whether you would say this person is a close friend or not, and why?
Describe a classmate or colleague you often meet or met.
Work and Studies
What it would look like?&What facilities it would have?&Where it would be?&And say if you think you will ever work in a place like that or not, and why?
Describe your dream workplace.
Work and Studies

Why you want to study that subject?&What things about that subject you find particularly interesting?&Where it is possible to study that subject?&And say if you think you will start studying it soon or not, and why?
Talk about a subject you would like to study in the future
Work and Studies

How and when you first became interested in that job?&What people in that job have to do everyday?&What qualifications and experience you need in order to get that job?&And say if you think you will be able to get that job or not, and why?
Describe a job you would like to do in the future.
Work and Studies

What kind of things you would do in that job?&What the working conditions would be like?&What kind of workplace you would work in?&And say if you think you will be able to get a job like that or not, and why?
Describe your dream job
Work and Studies
What the change was?&When and where this change happened?&What caused this change?&And explain how you benefited from this change.
Describe a recent change of you
Work and Studies
What the building looks like?&What is inside the building?&What things there are to do in the local area?&And say if you think it is a good place to work or not, and why?
Describe a workplace you have worked in or know about
Work and Studies
What the name of the subject was?&What topics you studied as part of that subject?&Why you liked it?&And say why you think some people didnâ€™t like that subject as much as you did.
Talk about a school subject you liked when you were younger
Work and Studies
Why you need to do it?&How often you do it?&If it is a difficult thing to do?&And say if you would like to do that thing more often or not, and why?
Describe one thing that you have to do as part of your work or studies.
Work and Studies
What it looks like from the outside?&What it looks like inside?&What facilities there are?&And say if you think it is a good school building or not, and why?
Describe a school that you are studying in or studied in
Work and Studies
How long they have been doing that job?&What the good things about that job are?&What the difficulties of doing that job are?&And say if you think that person enjoys their job or not, and why?
Talk about a job someone in your family does
Work and Studies
Work and Studies
Talk about a job you have done or know about
What people do in that job?&What kind of place they work in?&What clothes and equipment they need?&And say if you think it is a satisfying job to do or not, and why.
Work and Studies
Describe a classroom that you study or have studied in.
What part of the school or college it is in?&What it looks like?&What things are in it?&And say if you think the people who study there like it or not, and why.
Work and Studies
Talk about something you use to help you in your work or studies.
What it looks like?&What it does?&How often you use this thing?&And say what you would do if you could not use this object.
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a magazine that you often read.
What is it?&What type of people read it?&Is it popular in your country?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe your favourite photograph.
where the photo was taken?&who took the photo?&what can be seen from the photo?&and explain why it is the favourite photograph to you.
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a river, lake or sea which you like.
what the river, lake or sea is called&where it is?&what the land near it is like?&and explain why you like this river, lake or sea.
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe an activity you do for your health or fitness.
what you do how often you do it?&where you do it and explain?&how you think this activity helps you stay healthy or fit.
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe an interesting advertisement that you have seen.
where you saw it?&what it was about?&why you think it was an interesting advertisement.
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a time you need to arrive early
When it was?&What time you arrived?&Why you need to arrive early?&And explain how you felt.
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a popular place where people like to go swimming
Where is this place?&When did you first visit this place?&How often do you go to this place?&And explain why it is so popular.
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a piece of clothing you like wearing
what the item of clothing is?&where and when you bought it?&when you wear it?&and explain why you like wearing it.
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a painting or work of art that you remember deeply.
when you saw this work of art?&where you saw it?&what it looked like?&and explain your impression of it.
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe your favourite song or piece of music.
What kind of music it is?&Where you usually listen to it?&Why you like it?&and say what kind of mood this music puts you in.

Describe a TV series or drama you enjoy watching
What it is?&What itâ€™s about?&When did you first watched it?&And explain why you like watching it?

Describe a favorite sport which you watched
What it is?&When you watch it?&Who you watch it with?&And explain why you like watching it?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a place crowded with people
Where it was?&When you went there?&What you did there?&And explain how you felt about the crowded place.

Describe a cafÃ© that you have been to.
where it is?&why you went there?&what you ate or drank?&and explain why you liked or disliked the cafÃ©.

How you know it?&What it is about?&How often you use it?&and explain why you like to visit it?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Talk about a musical instrument you would like to be able to play but have never tried.
What the instrument looks like?&What it sounds like?&What kinds of people it is popular with?&And say if you think you will ever try to play that instrument or not, and why?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Talk about a book you have never read but would like to read.
How well known it is?&Why you would like to read it?&Why you have never read it before?&And say how you think it will compare to other books you have read?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Give a short presentation about a movie that you have never seen but would like to see.
What kind of movie it is?&How famous it is?&Why you want to see it?&And say if you think you will see that movie in the near future or not, and why?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Talk about a sport that interests you but you have never tried.
Where it is usually played?&What kinds of people usually play it?&Why it interests you?&And say if you think you will ever do this sport or not, and why?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Talk about a new sport or hobby you would like to take up
Why you are interested in that thing?&If it is an easy or hard thing to start?&What the best way to start doing it is?&And say if you think you will start doing it soon or not, and why?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Talk about a hobby you had when you were a child

How you first became interested in it?&How long you did it or have been doing it for?&Why you enjoyed doing it?&And say if you have become more or less interested in that hobby since you were a child, and why?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a TV programme that you often watch.

What kind of programme it is?&Why you watch it?&When and why you first started watching it?&And say if you think that programme is better than other TV programmes that are on at the same time or not, and why?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a place where you often go on your days off.
Where it is?&Who you go with?&Why you go there?&And say how it compares to other places where you could spend your free time?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a film you have seen which you remember well.
What sort of film it is?&When and where you saw it?&What your favourite part of the film was?&And explain why you remember it well?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a TV programme that you watch or know about
When it is on and which channel it is on?&What kind of programme it is?&What kind of people watch it?&And say if you think that programme is or could be popular in other countries or not, and why?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Describe a typical day when you are not working or studying
Where you go?&What you do?&Who you spend your time with?&And say how those days vary?
Sports, hobbies and free time
Talk about a book you are reading now or have read recently
How and why you got it?&How long you it took you to read it or how long you have been reading it?&What kind of book it is?&And say if you would like to read something else similar or not, and why.
Sports, hobbies and free time
Talk about a sport you like doing or watching
How you first became interested in it?&Why you are interested in it?&What equipment and skills are needed?&And say if you think it is an easy sport to do or not, and why.
Family, friends and pets
Describe a present which you were given and that you broken occasionally.
what it is?&for what occasion it was presented to you?&how you broken it?&what you felt when you broke it?
Family, friends and pets
Describe a time you waited for someone/something (special to happen).
what you were waiting for?&how you felt?&what you did while waiting?&why you had waiting?
Family, friends and pets
Describe a person who accidentally became your friend.
who the person is how you met him/her?&what made you two become friends?&and explain how is your friendship now.
Family, friends and pets
Describe a child you know.
how old is he or she?&what does s/he look like?&how you two are related?&and explain why do you like / dislike this child.
Family, friends and pets
Describe someone in your family who you really admire.
who he/she is?&what relation you have with him /her?&what you do together?&and explain why do you admire this person.
Family, friends and pets
Describe a friend that you really like to spend time with.
when and how you met?&how often you see this friend?&what kind of personality your friend has?&and explain why you like spending time with this friend.
Family, friends and pets
Describe a personal important event that you celebrated
What is it?&When did it happen?&Do you prefer to celebrate it with a group or people?&And explain how you felt about it

Describe a time you spent with a child.
